text_block_list.text:
I'd been Air Shakur's trainer for a while. 
Things were going well, but there was one thing bothering me――
What do you want...?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: <size=33>Uh... Want to get something to eat after training?</size>
<size=29>Um... Do you want to get something to eat after training?</size>

text_block_list.text: ...What?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: That one thing was the distance between us.

Her standing was shaky enough as it was. So I wanted to do 
anything I could to support her throughout the Twinkle Series.

It was absolutely essential for us to trust each other. 
It wouldn't happen overnight, so I had to lay the groundwork for 
building a good rapport.

So, with everything I learned about her, putting all the pieces 
together, I figured out some stuff that might pique her interest! 
Or so I thought――

Huh? An outdoor concert?
Hard pass.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: Hah? You built your own PC? You? Huh. ..........So?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
But it wasn't easy when she wanted to keep everything all 
professional.

Now you're on “Let's go somewhere together”?
What've you been tryna pull?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: I want us to build a rapport.
I want us to build a rapport.

text_block_list.text:
Don't bother. Look, I just needed you to fill the 『Trainer』 blank 
to debut, it was a arbitrary――
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: You're free to pick the spot.
You're free to pick the spot.

text_block_list.text:
“We don't have to talk. I just want to be a bit more dependable to 
you, even if it's for something small.”. I tried my best to get that 
across.

“We don't have to talk. I just want to be a bit more dependable to 
you, even if it's for something small.”. I tried my best to get that 
across.

All right, fine. I get it. Talking you down'd be a waste of time. 
...You said I could pick, yeah?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: Plans made, the next day came. It turns out she took me to――

To top it off, she'd reserved separate, single-person booths. 
We weren't even next to each other. But, I did in fact say she was 
free to pick the spot, so I had no recourse.

Well, given that I didn't know when she'd agree to go out again, 
this was the best shot I had. With that in mind――

What. 
Say something stupid and I'll kick your ass out.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
...
No, I'm not. That was stupider than I thought.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: <size=40>But, we're coming up on lunch time, so...</size>

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
choice_data_list: <size=40>W-well, at least get something to drink...</size>

text_block_list.text: SHUT UUUUP!
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: Look, if you want to "build a rapport" or whatever...! Stay the hell! Out of my way!
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: Excuse me, dear customer, do you have a moment?
text_block_list.name: Net Cafe Staff A

text_block_list.text:
...
Tch, now it's tough to go back.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
...Look, plenty of trainers keep it professional with their 
Umamusume. And more than a few of them are swimming in 
major trophies.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: There's no way you don't know that. So there can only be one reason you're doing all this annoying crap.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: You've deluded yourself into thinking getting all friendly would be for my benefit. That I'm such a pitiful, antisocial loner, you just have to help me.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
...something along those lines, I'd bet. 
You ain't the first.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
The only partner I need is my PC. If you get that, don't try to 
drag me out with you again.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
It was true that Shakur could make it as a loner. 
In all likelihood, she had the mental toughness and analytical 
ability to get by herself just fine.
If something unlikely happened―― if she met an obstacle she could not overcome alone― If she found herself in a position where she needed help, there would be nothing she could do.
choice_data_list: I won't give up just like that.

text_block_list.text: ...The hell?
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text:
Illogical as ever. 
It'd be easier for you to give up, with all the effort you waste 
yapping.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur

text_block_list.text: ...You do you.
text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
